data.title: Adalheidur Snaebjarnardottir, Sustainability Manager at Landsbankinn
data.meta_description: Listen to this episode from Nature Positive Podcast on Spotify. What is the role of banks in the transition towards Net Zero and Nature Positive?Â In this episode, we speak with Adalheidur Snaebjarnardottir about how climate and nature impact are becoming an integral part of financial reporting for companies and what role financial institutions play in the ongoing transitions.
